refnamediv.refpurpose: Selects the default database for database queries

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The mysqli_select_db function selects the default database (specified by the dbname parameter) to be used when performing queries against the database connection represented by the link parameter.

note.para: This function should only be used to change the default database for the connection. You can select the default database with 4th parameter in mysqli_connect.
